effect.ruby_sapphire: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4. If the target hasn’t used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, or if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, this move will fail.
effect.emerald: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4. If the target hasn’t used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, or if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, this move will fail.

effect.colosseum: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4. If the target hasn’t used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, or if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, this move will fail.
effect.xd: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4. If the target hasn’t used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, or if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, this move will fail.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Spitefully cuts the PP of the foe’s last move.
flavor_text.emerald: Spitefully cuts the PP of the foe’s last move.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A move that cuts 2 to 5 PP from the move last used by the foe.
